content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from edmonton alberta canada to enterprise northwest territories and was driving through peace river alberta. while driving down the highway into town, i pointed my camera out the car window to my left which overlooked the river valley and the town. i did not have time to stop because i was on a deadline. 

i literally rolled the window down, took the picture without taking my eyes off the road, and kept driving through town.

the camera is a stock standard sony dsc model, 6.0 megapixel camera without anything fancy.

i did not notice or hear any overflying aircraft or helicopter, even though the peace river airport would be on the far right of the picture on the other side of the valley.

i never actually looked at the pictures until about 2 weeks later and figured it was just an aircraft as viewed from the back and right or front and left, however over the past 2 years i've kept looking at the picture and wondering because everytime i've tried to enhance the picture myself i always get a disc-shaped object.

because i was driving i never got a look at the object with my own eyes, never saw its direction of travel, speed or motion. i never had any feelings or reaction to the object, until after i saw the picture.
content.summary: Took a picture and realized after that it did not look like a plane.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in front of my home overlooking the city where i live and as i was looking directly overhead , while sheilding my eyes from the city light, i observed a object that apeared to be shaped like a oval solid/intertube without a hole in the center, hence solid. it was silent fast dull red object traveling south to north seen over el cajon moving toward  el capitan resivoir where it disapeared from my view when  trying to point  out  object to my father nearby.  there were 2 airplane nearby... 1 oon a short approach to gilespie field, over  el cajon and turning from downwind (east heading and turning north ) to base before turning for final aproach on runway 27 left,  the 2nd airplane was  on long a long final aproach and was inbound over alpine crest heading west on aproach on 27 right.   the object  passed between and above the 2 aircraft.
content.summary: Oval solid/intertube  silent fast dull red object traveling south to north seen over el cajon moving toward  el capitan resivoir

content.detailedDescription: My husband had apparently been awake sine i had gone to bed around 1a.M. he had gone outside to smoke and as soon as he turned the lights on, he heard running/scattering on the side of our house. then once inside he said he heard an odd breathing sound. then came into bed around 4a.M. i was having an odd dream and woke instantly to my 21 month old son crying. i got up and checked on him because of how odd i felt from my dream(although i could not recall the dream) and how easily i woke to my son's cries. i went and checked on him and he was holding his stuffed animal and staring up at me quite awake,but sat still. i kissed him and tucked him in again and let him be. then my husband told me about the odd things before he had gotten into bed earlier, and went to the bathroom. i decided to look out side to the east...Towards magalia,ca and saw what looked like a star coming towards our home. as soon as i realized that it was not normal it seemed to stop,then i wondered ifmaybe my brain was just flooded with melatonin; and as soon as that thought crossed my mind the star seemed to come towards my home again. i started getting quite scared and even got nauseous. and instantly knocked on the bathroom door to tell my husband. he then looked out the window and said he saw a star. i looked again and the star seemed to be moving from side to side, kind of wavering around in the same area. my husband looked again and said it was probably a cloud passing over the star and that why it appeared to be moving. i looked out the window again and the star was gone and there were grey clouds out in the sky but i wasn't sure if the clouds were where i had seen the star.
content.summary: Close encounter?

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the roof watching the stars through binoculars,i saw tree line
move as though a strong wind blew....No wind at the time.I was amazed at
the movement of the trees,very loud like someone climbing or shaking trees
i saw nothing until a few moments later,an outline of square or maybe
triangle above me.....A glimmer of its edges i saw.Then it was gone,the next morning i woke up with a tiangle mark on my knee,it has been there since september of 09.I dont know what it was,i only saw outline of it
from my point of view.....Like dots and lines   .-.-.-.-.- like this
and since it was dark that was the best i could see.At first i was startled but was amused at the sound of the trees.
content.summary: A outline of square or triangle

content.detailedDescription:
Budapest, magyarorsz���g - 2001. szeptember 29-���n ���ll���t���lag egy magyar vad���szpil���ta videofelv���telt k���sz���tett egy ez���st���s, korong alak��� t���rgyr���l. az objektum jobb fel���l k���zel���tett, majd elhaladt a rep���l���g���p mellett, ���s elt���nt a felh���kben, amint ez a felv���telen is j���l l���tszik.
a honv���delmi miniszt���riumban nem v���laszoltak a videofelv���tellel kapcsolatos k���rd���sekre, ���s arra is felh���vt���k a figyelmet, hogy hivatalosan nem fogj���k komment���lni az esetet. a tagad���s ellen���re, amikor f���lvet���d���tt a pil���ta neve, kider���lt, hogy az illet��� val���ban a magyar l���gier��� k���tel���k���be tartozik, ���s val���ban felder���t��� rep���l���st v���gzett a f���v���ros f���l���tt.
content.summary: Disc-shaped object photographed by hungarian military pilot (09 29 2001) - (hungarian description)

content.detailedDescription:
This image shows two flat-top disk shaped ufos flying parallel together above my tree, taken on 15 dec 2009. it was also captured on 13 dec 2009, these two same colored invisible round disks hung up in the sky side by side. it���s diameter less was than 1 metre(? ), one of them emitted some white light. 

please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from: http://ufo-spacelife.Blogspot.Com/
content.summary: Photo of two flat-top disk ufos flying parallel

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking the dogs one night in lincoln lincolnshire at about 20:00.
 
i used to live on tudor road, which backed onto hartsholm country park below.  
	 
 harts park, lincoln.	around 3 miles from lincoln city centre is hartsholm country park in lincolnshire uk.
 
i used to have an open mind about ufo`s in those days as i thought that we the human race must be very arrogant as to believe that we are the only living thing in the universe with intelligence.
 
confirmation that intelligence does exist elsewhere in the universe was proved to me that night 02/01/2000.
 
routinely i would walk the dogs every night up a path which leads from birchwood avenue to the edge of hartsholm country park, the path ran around the back of my house in tudor road.  the night started off as a normal every day night until whilst walking up the winding path i stopped and let the dogs off the lead, this was as we were reaching the end of the path which leads into the park, it was common practice for me to let the dogs run into the woods to do their business while i waited for them at the end of the path, there is a street lamp there and on this occasion the filament was red instead of orange.
 
while i waited not thinking about anything in particular i experienced a severe pain in my temporal lobe, it felt like the worst migraine that i have ever experienced before, i put my hand up to my head and i felt compelled to look up as if the pain was coming from a direction, and when i looked up i could not believe what i was looking at, i saw a huge bright white light, and it was blinding to look at, it was the brightest whitest light that i have ever seen, i was ridged to the spot in shock, and i felt like my mind was being read, i remember feeling very angry because without my permission all that was in my mind was stolen, mind raped is the best description that i can give.
 
i began to fight back mentally and i cursed it with every thing that i could from god and jesus through to mary, then all of a sudden it just shot straight up at an indescribable speed and became a star, you remember the old black and white televisions when you turned them off the picture would reduce to a tiny dot, well that is as close to the speed that i can get.   
 
i stood there still ridged to the spot when my dogs suddenly appeared, i did not even hang around to put the leads on them and i ran home as fast as i could, the dogs thankfully arrived with me unharmed, i ran because i was afraid that it would come back and get me.
i told my partner at the time and we agreed that we should keep it to ourselves.   
 
the following day at around 15:00 in broad daylight, i decided that my partner and i would have fish and chips for tea, so i took a walk with my german sheppard dog down to the chippy, which was at a shopping precinct called the forum just off birchwood avenue, when halfway to the chippy i felt that compulsion again to look up and there through a gap in the clouds was this huge black triangular craft with lights very dimly lit, the lights where fuzzy and distorted to look at as the clouds passed under the strange craft, the colours omitted was red and green, i watched in shock as cars went down the road and the drivers not knowing what was hovering above them, school children walked the pavement on the other side of the road blissfully unaware.
 
i didn���t raise the alarm, i don���t know why but i just watched, then another thick cloud passed underneath it, then another gap appeared and there was nothing to be seen, it had completely vanished.   i hatefully got to the fish and chip shop, said nothing to the staff apart from ordering my meals and got home as fast as i could.
 
on arriving home i told my partner and she was surprised but very understanding, we talked all night and agreed what we had before, to keep it to ourselves.
two weeks later we had a neighbour come over for dinner, and as the night progressed the wine flowed and bill my neighbour who worked for boeing aircraft manufacturers on their breaking systems at waddington airbase, i told him myself what i had seen. he listened intently and said, "you should have mentioned it before as i believe someone else reported seeing a ufo to the lincolnshire echo".   i still have not seen the report that���s if it exists at all, and it would be great if it does then it would confirm my sighting.
 
the houses in area that i lived in called doddington park are mainly occupied by raf pilots and personnel, i wonder if that has any bearing to my sighting, i myself am not connected to the raf, i am just an ordinary civilian.
 
yours truthfully
 
ash
content.summary: A brilliant silent white light that scared the **** out of me , so much so that i froze on the spot .

content.detailedDescription: I was outside walking my dog before bed time at 12:15 am realy clear night lots of stars, we have a lot of planes that fly over this area  going an coming from europe so i know what a plane looks like at night, this was not a plane or helicoperter, i look towards the east over the hills and there was a cluster of flashing lights, red,green,orang,white,ran in my hous an got my binoculors, to get a better look, the lights were brighter and seem to reflect off my binoculors when flashing,could not make out a shape to far away, just lights, i watched it for about an hour an 15 minutes, it seems to move up an down, left an right from time to time, it was still ther when i went to bed would like to know what this was?
content.summary: Flashing lights hovering no sound, little movement.

content.detailedDescription: My car broke down on hwy 5 i was with my ex husband and my daughter,the battery went dead on the car..As we waited for a tow truck,i saw a huge light coming over a hill i expected to see a tracktor or something similair but to my disbelief all of a sudden instead of a tractor there was a bright like the size of a comet a very big comet, it was bright yellow it just looked like a ball of light,it was so briight it was almost blinding as we watched it, it continued to rise up and changed to blue, then green then dark red and shot so fast to the heavens. we watched it until it was just a dot even with the stars...I dont know if this is some kinda goverment secret but it was absolutley amazing.....For all these years my family and i have keep this our lil secret but it seems the world is a lil more receptable to this now so i just had to let others no we are not alone.
content.summary: Looked like a comet taking off from earth rising off and shot up to the stars

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i were in the car driving south on route 12 in west boylston, massachusetts.  at 7:34 pm we were passing the meolla's ice cream stand which is about a 1/4 of a mile before the local wal-mart, when we both saw a bright florrisint-green, circular light.  it streaked and arched in a downward motion towards the east, then disappeared.  we noticed it because it was off in the distance above the traffic signals, right in front of us. it happened so fast,(for approx. 1-2 seconds), there was no time to photograph it with a cell phone.  i suggested that it could have been a flare or a drone.  however, my daughter insists that it was too big and too fast to have been either.  (her 16 year old eyes are better than my 50 year old eyes at night!)  
while continuing towards our home we were unable to think of or see any explanations or information regarding what we had seen.  because we were in traffic at the time of the sighting, we were unable to stop to inquire if there were any other witnesses to this event.  when driving by the wachusette reservoir area, we were scoping the water and the landscape with our eyes in hopes of seeing any evidence or traces of what we had seen.  there was an increase in air traffic, including a helicopter as we traveled down route 110 east in clinton massachusetts before the high school, at 7:43pm.
we felt excited about seeing a ufo and couldn't take our eyes off of the sky!  when we arrived home, we stood outside in our yard for a while to try to determine if it would have been visible to us from that vantage point.  we concluded that,we wouldn't have been able to see it from our yard, even though the object was up high. tonight i'm watching the late news cast on tv to see if there are any reports about our sighting regarding what it may have been.
content.summary: My daughter and i saw a bright florrissent-green circular light that arched and streaked in a downward  motion.  the sighting was about 1  to 2 seconds in duration.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down rte 9 going north at about 9:40-10pm on may 12,2004. as i approached the academy st exit ramp,i saw what at first appeared to be a string of red and green lights blinking slowly. as my car neared the lights, i found myself directly under an immense,low-flying craft. it was a huge, boomerang-shaped craft--it had a dark grey body and red and green lights along its "wings". it moved so slowly, it appeared to be floating. it was completely soundless.
   i tried to keep the object in sight,which was no easy feat since i had to keep my attention on the road. by the time i was able to park my car, the boomerang had vanished. 
 when i first noticed this craft, i assumed it was some type of jet. the longer i watched it,however, the more i realized how impossible it would be for a jet to move that slowly, especially at such a low altitude.
i also can't undersatand why nobody else has come forward about this. at the time of this sighting, there were at least a dozen other vehicles besides mine in the area.
content.summary: Object moving south down rte 9--flying/floating slowly; immense, silent  flying low.

content.detailedDescription:
on or about dec 15th, 2009 i saw a something streak thru the sky just above the tree line and across the lake (as seen from our front porch). it was very early in the morning at about 6am before first light.

it was about the size of a quarter and was glowing orange. it sped thru the sky in a straight line from east to the west at about the speed of a bullet and it made no sound.

the sighting lasted maybe 2 to 3  seconds. 

we are less than 5 miles from an air traffic control tower near lynchburg, va. 

it definitely was an object. it was flying thru the air and whatever it was is unknown. 

i do not agree to the release of my contact information to third parties as part of the investigation into this report of a ufo sighting (at this time). 

however, if others come forward, i might reveal my identity to the group.

thanks

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? i was relaxing on the front porch.
2. what made you first notice the object? it was extremely fast and glowing orange.
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? a ufo
4. describe the object and its actions and motions. described above...
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
    difficult to find words to describe this experience
6. how did you lose sight of the object? it quickly went out off sight behind the trees.
content.summary: A glowing orange object the size of a quarter, sped thru sky in a straight line at the speed of a bullet and made no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down rte 9 going north at about 9:40-10pm on may 12,2004. as i approached the academy st exit ramp,i saw what at first appeared to be a string of red and green lights blinking slowly. as my car neared the lights, i found myself directly under an immense,low-flying craft. it was a huge, boomerang-shaped craft--it had a dark grey body and red and green lights along its "wings". it moved so slowly, it appeared to be floating. it was completely soundless.
   i tried to keep the object in sight,which was no easy feat since i had to keep my attention on the road. by the time i was able to park my car, the boomerang had vanished. 
 when i first noticed this craft, i assumed it was some type of jet. the longer i watched it,however, the more i realized how impossible it would be for a jet to move that slowly, especially at such a low altitude.
i also can't undersatand why nobody else has come forward about this. at the time of this sighting, there were at least a dozen other vehicles besides mine in the area.
content.summary: Object moving south down rte 9--flying/floating slowly; immense, silent  flying low

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed something i can���t explain in the skies over wadesboro, north carolina, usa 01.02.2010. i managed to take a few pictures on my 5 megapixel cell phone and i can not explain what these objects were. my father (retired cargo plane & helicopter pilot with 10.000 hours experience) can not identify the objects as airplanes, helicopters or blimps. i am not one of those people who obsess with ufos, but i really have no idea what these objects were. when i took the pictures there was only one object, but every few minutes 2 other identical objects would come into frame. since i was driving i didn���t manage to get any pictures with more than one object in frame. the sighting lasted for about 30 minutes and the one object didn���t seem to move. it was at sunset and i could not stay to observe any longer as i was getting my nephew home. my nephew has pictures on his 8 megapixel digital camera (3 pictures) one of them showing the object change to a black color.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Disc,   Teardrop,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Unexplained shapes in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was observing the rising full moon, immediately below but off to the right of the moon there appeared to be a darker place which was like a circular void.  within that void a large x of light appeared.  that x started to spin, and as it spun a lit cloud tube extended from the place where the void across the sky to the right of the point of origin. at the point where the black void started and where the tube started a tiny blip of light came out, which moved out a distance from the point of origin and then disappeared.  the tube started to fade, but continued to seem un-naturally lit for about 3 minutes as it shortened.  it did not flow away like a cloud, the sky was perfectly clear and this appeared to be way above the atmosphere.  it had entirely disappeared within 5 minutes.
content.summary: Wormhole ufo?

content.detailedDescription: I was on the roof of my work looking at how clear the sky was. i noticed a streek of cloud in the sky; almost like when jets release whatever they release in the air around cali; when behind the cloud was this tirangle thing. it had no lights. the only way i saw this thing was because of how bright the moon was. it was just coasting over the sky. now...I had done the research before i saw this thing, but was still skeptical. at this point, i would give it 50/50, only because we have no idea what the government has their hands in. but at the same time, i saw a solid object, basically floating(coasting because it was moving), with no sound!!! the only way would be with remote control, but why would it beso low? my work is 10 stories, but when im on the roof, im almost eye level with the top of the hollywood hills. the funny thing to me, is that in the direction it was flying, it would have went right over burbank airport airspace. i dont know...I just just thought that i should do this because of all the phony stuff i see on tv. sorry no pics
content.summary: All black, triangle, no lights, no sound

content.detailedDescription: As object moved over my landlords house toward his driveway, it cruised right over my head and i could have hit it with a rock as i was standing in the driveway. it cruised over my cottage and over mammoth rd. and just over the trees on the other side of the road. at that tlime, i was living in dracut, ma. 01826 at 455 mammoth rd. at first, i was afraid but then i figured that if they could fly an object like that, they had to be more intelligent than i. so, i stayed in the driveway to get a better look at it. it made a slight puttering sound as it cruised overhead but i was unable to see any markings as it was dark out at the time. when i first encountered the object, it was over gerrish ave. in a field beyond some houses located on gerrish ave. in dracut. when i approached the driveway of my landlord, i saw the white light shining down that seem to erase any visions of the trees and houses. as soon as i saw it, the light went out as though the object had detected my presence. then, it came over the trees and houses toward me. i knew that this was a ufo and started to go to my house for fear that i was about to be adducted. however, i changed my mind and declded to get a good look at it. it was a huge disc bigger than a house and just floated over my head. i never reported it for fear people would think i was insane.At that point, i knew we were being visited and observed by alien beings and that we were not alone in this huge universe.
content.summary: White light that went off when i spotted it. object moved over houses toward me.

content.detailedDescription:
On january 1, 2010, at 12:30 pm witness returned home on his motorcycle and while on front of his house he looked up to the north and saw six objects reflecting bright sunlight.  witness and his wife obtained a video camera and binoculars and obtained about 7 minutes of video.  the objects changed formation from a v to horizontal and their movement seemed smooth and intelligently controlled.  one of the video frames shows an airliner on approach to dfw airport to the south along with one of the objects.  the objects appeared farther than the airliner, therefore, they were at least several miles away.  the objects appeared circular and shinny silver.

entered by gary neitzel, state section director, tarrant co, field investigor, after interviewing witnesses.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Six objects videotaped north of frisco, texas

content.detailedDescription:
on january 4th 2010 i went out to look for the object flashing  the white light. i was outside about for about 25 minutes when me and my husband seen a white flashing object. i seen it flash twice then my husband seen it a third time using the night vision goggles. it was in the north western sky flashing and flying north.



this incident started for me back on december 18th 2008.  a friend of mine whom does not believe in ufo's called about a blinking light in the sky. i went to check the area of the sky that she pointed out but i could not see anything unusual but she said she saw  it on four different occasions starting late july of 2008 i decided that i would make it a practice to go out every night and look at the sky in hope to find it and it was cloudy a lot so i waited for it to clear then finally a few weeks later on december the 18th i seen it and when it flashed it was a pure bright white light and as i observed it i could see the flash going back into a say oval shaped object  and as it went up the object the light would go out from behind it. this light was clearly contained within an object.I could see it well enough that i could see like some sort of compartment where i thought the light might stop and then it did stop about maybe say two thirds up the object then where the light stopped i could see the oval shaped of a form of some kind of compartment where the light did not seem to extend it self. i could see this object was stationary in the sky. i had a friend with me at the time she saw the flash but then she did not see the form because she was playing with the dog's.
content.summary: Object flashing white light in sky

content.detailedDescription:
We were outside with our dogs when we saw a series of large amber colored lights ,first 3 in a row come on and go out.  they were over our mountains.  then they came on again several miles to the right. this time they were not in a row..Two of the lights were together the other above and to the left. over the course of an hour we further saw single lights come on and go out quickly in different parts of the sky.  since, we were outside we heard no engine sounds.  my husband is a former navy jet pilot.  he could not identify what they were.  we did not see them move at all. there were no running lights visible which is in violation of the faa if it were a conventional aircraft.

has anyone from las cruces mentioned these sightings ?
content.summary: Lights

content.detailedDescription: I was approximately 4-5 years old when my mother wrapped me up in a blanket (it was very cold outside - winter) and took me outside our house. she held me in her arms and pointed up at the sky (towards the south). it was dark outside (night). there was a dark object with red and green lights hovering approximately 100 feet above us and approximately 100 feet south of our location. i remember her saying, "look! look!" she was terrified, which made me very upset. that is why the memory is so vivid to me. however, i cannot recall the shape of the object, although the bottom of it appeared to be dark gray/coal colored. it was hovering silently and moving very slowly to the northeast. after approximately 15 minutes, it moved out of the range of our vision. since this incident happened so long ago, i am reporting it solely for historical purposes.
content.summary: Dark shape in sky with red/green lights, hovering silently

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from alamogordo, nm on white sands blvd heading toward tularosa, nm.  at the intersection of white sands and us 82 toward cloudcroft, i looked up to my left and up in the sky, not to high up and to low for a plane to fly i saw lights.  they were gold and were horizontal with two lights then a space and then four lights.  below those lights were a couple other lights but i am not sure how many.  the lights were there one second and gone the next.  i told my sons whom were in the car with me what i had seen and i thought it was rather odd.  as we drove from us 82 toward cloudcroft, we turned left toward la luz new mexico.  when we go into la luz, we stopped at the stop sign, went straight passed the post office and was heading toward the brigde to go up into the canyon.  right before we came to the church that is on the left i looked up again and told my oldest son to look out the window.  sure enough there were the lights again.  this time we saw the two lights and then the four lights.  there were no lights below these lights.  they were pretty low this time, way to low for a plane to fly, right above the tree tops and there was no sound at all.  they lights were there for about 5 second and then they were gone.  i pulled into the church to see if i could see anything else but there was nothing there in the sky just the stars.
content.summary: Saw lights in the sky way to low for a plane to fly

content.detailedDescription:
Looked as a star thought it was an air plane but very high in the sky. i had watched it for a little bit because it seemed to be moving faster then a plane would for that altitude, but it then suddenly made a quick and sharp u turn and went for a while then made another sharp turn about 100 to 110 degree turn and sped up very fast then i lost it in some clouds and it was gone . this wasnt my first time seeing this this is my 4th in 2 years watching and paying attention to the skys and it is always a bright dot in the sky with the ability to make its self brighter noticeably at will and make sharpfast turns and fly faster then any airplane i have seen
i am just so curiouse to what this is flying that high and fast
content.summary: Strange light speed and manueverability altitude.

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i were driving southbound on i-75 one afternoon several months ago when i observed two aircraft that appeared identical to each other, flying side by side at the same speed. both aircraft had a vapor trail immediately behind them, however, one aircraft was pulling its vapor trail with it so that it didn't change in length. the other aircraft left a vapor trail that stretched into the distance from where it had been. i was very surprised to see that one of the aircraft was pulling its vapor trail along with it when the other one wasn't so i pointed it out to my fiance. i had never seen an aircraft pull its vapor trail with it. a few weeks ago i woke up in the night because i realized that what i probably saw was one aircraft being reflected on the surface of something i couldn't see. it was a bright sunny afternoon with few high cirrus clouds. the reason the vapor trail appeared to be pulled along is because it was at the end of a reflective surface. whatever was reflecting the other plane had to be huge because the whole aircraft and a good length of its vapor trail was fully reflected. there was no mistaking the visual event we witnessed. there is a military base nearby where central command for the middle east is headquartered so we might have some kind of top secret (invisible) aircraft in the area i suppose; but i can't imagine us having one as big as this one would have to be.
content.summary: What looked like two matchig aircraft, one leaving a vapor trail the other pulling a vapor trail

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 8:10 cst while letting the dogs outside in our backyard, facing due west i noticed a bright white flashing light in the sky and i thought to myself, i never noticed a tower in that direction.  we live on a private road in the country and the reason i never noticed a tower, is because there is not a tower in the area we live.  i returned back into the house, puttered in the kitchen for 2 minutes and then immediately went upstairs to inform my wife that she needed to look outside and witness this.  when we approaced the patio doors in our bedroom we both observed the light from the 2nd story of our house this flashing bright white light.  i then turned off the tv, shut off the computer screen and turned off the lights.  we both stood at the patio doors watching the object which was suspended in the sky and not moving.  from our position on the second floor and looking from both the 1st and 2nd floor of the house, this object had not moved in 5 minutes.  my wife happended to be on the phone with a friend and also mentioned this strange event to her friend.  i then slowly opened the patio doors and went outside on the deck off of the 2nd floor to see if i could hear anything, after approximately 2-3 seconds the object moved to the east at a very slow rate.  as the object came overhead, no noise was heard or any outline of any shape, it was just the bright flashing light and it continued to travel at that same pace for approximately one minute.  after standing outside for this timeframe, i then came into the house as it was too cold outside.  feelings of curiousity, excitement and nervousness were both experienced by my wife and i.  this was a very interesting event!!!
content.summary: Bright low level flashing light which stood still, resembled a flashing tower, we have no towers in the area.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in  a popular commercial area here in bogota when i notice many people 
looking at the sky ,so i see three spheres in the sky first they were immobile for about ten minutes then they began to move but at the exact distant one from each other later they form a triangle formation a guy took a camera whit a high range lens to zoom but informed that the only visible feature was a reddish color but still son bright to identify hopefully is video evidence in local news i wonder why this events are no reported 
i know what i see and i am truthfully the event was observed for about 200 people 

regards

fernando
here are the links
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=gxuzavf4rga
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=gwe_ur77kdi&feature=related
content.summary: Many bright spheres across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking up at the stars and then i saw a star flashing in the sky then i saw three flashing air crafts and that was flying at a low altitude around 500 ft there was three moveing and at first i thought it was a airplaine but it had no engine noise. then the two stars that i watched hovered in the sky it didnt appear to move its position it just hovred in the sky. the one star was bright around 500 ft then one of the stars moved its position in the sky. and thats all i know about these three ufo's.

p.S i hope im not crazy.
content.summary: Saw the ufos from clarksville, tennessee.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were standing outside when he noticed a star that appeared to be moving. when i looked up it was about three. then, we looked over and saw one that low flying. it was not blinking at first, then it started to mimick an airplane with flashing lights. yet no sound was heard. there were many witnesses to the event. wish i had a camcorder!! :( it was a great moment. we're not alone!!!!
content.summary: 4 moved across sky at different paces and one was low enough to see well. no sound from any of the crafts.

content.detailedDescription: Looked out back window, saw an object with very bright light come toward me, it moved my my house as it came over it dropped to almost tree top level. my husband also saw it. no sound, very bright lights around it and red to.We both noticed no noise.About the size of a van. metal looking.It moved and then dropped down.I was excited.
content.summary: Saw an object come over my house and travil over, tree top level.Bright lights

content.detailedDescription:
I entered i-4 from the debary exit, headed north, and almost immediately saw the object. it took me a second to realize that it wasn't a plane or helicopter, because i was watching the road. it was directly ahead of me (to the north). 

i started examining it closer, something about it just didn't seem right. i thought then that it might have been a firework, but after a few moments watching it decided it wasn't. it was moving too slowly to be a rocket, and glided left/right, towards me and away from me. perhaps not directly focused on me, but it did manage to stay in my view. i can't estimate it's elevation, but it didn't seem to be any higher than i've seen most helicopters. it did not have a tail.

it was too dim to be a flare. it was a fiery orange color, like a sunset, and had a tight, but wavering corona. it had no hot white point, but was a fairly solid orange, maybe dipping into red at the fringes.

i realized then, that i had never seen anything like it before, and that is likely what drew my attention to it. i  was shocked to realize that i couldn't place the object or come up with a satisfactory explanation for it.

i exited i-4 at the last exit for deland, tried to keep sight of it as the ramp made a circle, but lost sight of it for a second or two. when i had finished exiting i tried to reacquire it. it should have been easy to spot, there was plenty of open sky, but it had vanished.

edit: after digesting the encounter, i didn't feel anything other than elation at my first sighting of something i couldn't identify.

during the sighting, i had the distinct impression that i was seeing two objects. two identical spheres, but so close to each other that they appeared as one. again, there was only the impression of this, i can't claim to have seen two distinct objects.
content.summary: Sighted orange ball of light.
